column2: We propose a method of organizing read-
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=2 left-column centered left-indent right-indent hanged-line longer-tail line-double-space line-space headchar-capital tailchar-hiphen

column2: ing materials for vocabulary learning. It
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=3 left-column centered left-indent right-indent aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: enables us to select a concise set of
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=3 left-column centered left-indent right-indent aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: reading texts (from a target corpus) that
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=3 left-column centered left-indent right-indent aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: contains all the target vocabulary to be
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=3 left-column centered left-indent right-indent aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: learned. We used a specialized vocab-
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=3 left-column centered left-indent right-indent aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: ulary for an English certification test as
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=4 left-column centered left-indent right-indent aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: the target vocabulary and used English
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=4 left-column centered left-indent right-indent aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: Wikipedia, a free-content encyclopedia, as
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=4 left-column centered left-indent right-indent aligned-line headchar-capital

column2: the target corpus. The organized reading
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=4 left-column centered left-indent right-indent aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: materials would enable learners not only
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=4 left-column centered left-indent right-indent aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: to study the target vocabulary efficiently
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=5 left-column centered left-indent right-indent aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: but also to gain a variety of knowledge
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=5 left-column centered left-indent right-indent aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: through reading. The reading materials
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=5 left-column centered left-indent right-indent aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: are available on our web site.

column2: 1 Introduction

column2: EFL (English as a foreign language) learners and
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=6 left-column full-justified aligned-line longer-tail line-double-space line-space headchar-capital

column2: teachers can easily access a wide range of English
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=6 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: reading materials on the Internet. For example, cur-
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=6 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: rent news stories can be read on web sites such as
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=7 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: those for CNN, <sup>1</sup> TIME, 2 or the BBC. 3 Specialized
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=7 left-column full-justified font-largest aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: reading materials for EFL learners are also provided
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=7 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: on web sites like EFL Reading. <sup>4</sup>
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=7 left-column right-indent font-largest aligned-line shorter-tail headchar-lower

column2: This situation, however, does not mean that EFL
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=7 left-column left-indent indented-line longer-tail headchar-capital

column2: learners and teachers can easily select proper texts
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=7 left-column full-justified hanged-line headchar-lower

column2: suited to their specific purposes, for example, learn-
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=8 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: ing vocabulary through reading. On the contrary,
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=8 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-comma above-double-space above-line-space

page=0 xpos=4 ypos=9 left-column left-indent right-indent indented-line longer-tail line-blank-line line-double-space line-space numeric-only column-bottom

column2: EFL teachers have to carefully select texts, if they
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=2 right-column full-justified column-top headchar-capital

column2: want their students to learn a specialized vocabulary
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=2 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: through reading in a particular discipline such as
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=2 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: medicine, engineering, or economics. However, it is
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=3 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: problematic for teachers to select materials for learn-
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=3 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: ing a target vocabulary with short authentic texts.
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=3 right-column right-indent aligned-line shorter-tail headchar-lower tailchar-period above-line-space

column2: It is possible to automate this selection process
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=3 right-column left-indent indented-line longer-tail line-space headchar-capital

column2: given the target vocabulary to be learned and the tar-
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=3 right-column full-justified hanged-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: get corpus from which texts are gathered (Utiyama
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=4 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: et al., 2004). In this research (Utiyama et al., 2004),
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=4 right-column full-justified aligned-line year headchar-lower tailchar-comma

column2: we used a specialized vocabulary for an English
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=4 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: certification test as the target vocabulary and used
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=4 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: newspaper articles from The Daily Yomiuri as the
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=4 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: target corpus. We then organized a set of reading
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=5 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: materials, which we called courseware <sup>5</sup> , using the
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=5 right-column full-justified font-largest aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: algorithm in Section 2. The courseware consisted
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=5 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: of 116 articles and contained all the target vocabu-
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=5 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: lary. We used the courseware in university English
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=5 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: classes from May 2004 to January 2005. We found
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=6 right-column full-justified aligned-line year headchar-lower

column2: that the courseware was effective in learning vocab-
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=6 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: ulary (Tanimura and Utiyama, in preparation).
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=6 right-column right-indent aligned-line shorter-tail headchar-lower tailchar-period above-line-space

column2: Based on the promising results, our next goal is
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=6 right-column left-indent indented-line longer-tail line-space headchar-capital

column2: to distribute courseware (produced with our algo-
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=6 right-column full-justified hanged-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: rithm) to EFL teachers and learners so that we can
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=7 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: receive wider feedback. To this end, the course-
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=7 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: ware we constructed (Utiyama et al., 2004) is inade-
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=7 right-column full-justified aligned-line year headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: quate because it was prepared from The Daily Yomi-
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=7 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: uri, which is copyrighted. We therefore replaced
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=7 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: The Daily Yomiuri with English Wikipedia, <sup>6</sup> a free-
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=8 right-column full-justified font-largest aligned-line headchar-capital tailchar-hiphen

column2: content encyclopedia, and developed new course-
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=8 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen above-double-space above-line-space

column2: <sup>5</sup> Courseware usually includes software in addition to other
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=8 right-column left-indent indented-line line-double-space line-space headchar-super

column2: materials. However, in this paper, the term courseware is used
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=8 right-column full-justified font-smallest hanged-line headchar-lower

column2: to refer to the reading materials only.
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=8 right-column right-indent font-smallest aligned-line shorter-tail headchar-lower tailchar-period

column2: <sup>6</sup> http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Main Page
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=9 right-column left-indent right-indent indented-line longer-tail headchar-super column-bottom above-blank-line above-double-space above-line-space

column2: Proceedings of the ACL Interactive Poster and Demonstration Sessions,
column3: page=0 xpos=1 ypos=9 single-column left-indent right-indent font-smallest column-top line-blank-line line-double-space line-space headchar-capital tailchar-comma

column2: pages 117–120, Ann Arbor, June 2005.  2005 c Association for Computational Linguistics
column3: page=0 xpos=1 ypos=9 single-column left-indent right-indent font-smallest hanged-line longer-tail year headchar-lower page-bottom

column2: ware. It is available on our web site. <sup>7</sup>
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=0 left-column right-indent font-largest page-top headchar-lower

column2: In the following, will we first summarize our al-
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=0 left-column left-indent indented-line longer-tail headchar-capital tailchar-hiphen

column2: gorithm and then describe details on the courseware
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=0 left-column full-justified hanged-line headchar-lower

column2: we constructed from English Wikipedia.
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=0 left-column right-indent aligned-line shorter-tail headchar-lower tailchar-period above-double-space above-line-space

column2: 2 Algorithm
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=0 left-column right-indent font-larger aligned-line shorter-tail line-double-space line-space numbered-heading1 above-double-space above-line-space

column2: We want to prepare efficient courseware for learning
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=1 left-column full-justified aligned-line longer-tail line-double-space line-space headchar-capital

column2: a target vocabulary. We defined efficiency in terms
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=1 left-column full-justified aligned-line itemization headchar-lower

column2: of the amount of reading materials that must be read
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=1 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: to learn a required vocabulary. That is, efficient
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=1 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: courseware is as short as possible, while containing
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=2 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: the required vocabulary. We used a greedy method
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=2 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: to develop the efficient courseware (Utiyama et al.,
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=2 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-comma
page=1 xpos=0 ypos=2 left-column right-indent aligned-line shorter-tail year tailchar-period

column2: Let C be the courseware under development and
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=2 left-column left-indent font-largest indented-line longer-tail headchar-capital

column2: V be the target vocabulary to be learned. We iter-
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=3 left-column full-justified font-largest hanged-line headchar-capital tailchar-hiphen

column2: atively select a document (from the target corpus)
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=3 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: that has the largest number of new types <sup>8</sup> (types con-
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=3 left-column full-justified font-largest aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: tained in V but not in C) and put it into C until C
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=3 left-column centered right-indent font-largest aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: covering all of V . “C covers all of V ” means that
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=3 left-column full-justified font-largest aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: each word in V occurs at least once in a document
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=4 left-column full-justified font-largest aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: in C.
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=4 left-column right-indent font-largest aligned-line shorter-tail headchar-lower tailchar-period

column2: More concretely, let V todo be the part of V not
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=4 left-column left-indent font-largest indented-line longer-tail headchar-capital

column2: covered by C, and let V done be V − V todo . We iter-
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=4 left-column full-justified font-largest hanged-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: atively put document d into C that maximizes G(·),
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=4 left-column centered right-indent font-largest aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-comma above-line-space

column2: G(d|α, V todo , V done )
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=5 left-column left-indent right-indent font-largest indented-line shorter-tail line-space headchar-capital

column2: = αg(d|V todo ) + (1 − α)g(d|V done ), (1)
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=5 left-column left-indent font-largest indented-line longer-tail above-line-space

column2: until C covers all of V . We then define g(·) as
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=5 left-column right-indent font-largest hanged-line shorter-tail line-space headchar-lower above-line-space

column2: g(d|V <sub>x</sub> )
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=5 left-column left-indent right-indent indented-line shorter-tail line-space headchar-lower

column2: k <sub>1</sub> + 1
column3: page=1 xpos=1 ypos=5 left-column left-indent right-indent indented-line longer-tail itemization headchar-lower
page=1 xpos=0 ypos=5 left-column left-indent right-indent font-smaller hanged-line shorter-tail

column2: k <sub>1</sub> ((1 − b) + b <sub>E(|W</sub> <sup>|W</sup> (d)| (·)|) )+1 <sup>|W</sup> (d) ∩ V x |, (2)
column3: page=1 xpos=1 ypos=5 left-column left-indent font-largest indented-line longer-tail itemization headchar-lower above-line-space

column2: where W (d) is the set of types in d, E(|W (·)|) is
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=6 left-column full-justified font-largest hanged-line line-space headchar-lower

column2: the average for |W (·)| over the whole corpus, and
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=6 left-column full-justified font-largest aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: k <sub>1</sub> and b are parameters that depend on the corpus.
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=6 left-column full-justified font-largest aligned-line itemization headchar-lower tailchar-period

column2: We set k <sub>1</sub> as 1.5 and b as 0.75. g(d|V x ) takes a large
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=6 left-column full-justified font-largest aligned-line headchar-capital

column2: value when there is a large number of common types
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=7 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: between W (d) and V <sub>x</sub> and d is short. These effects
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=7 left-column full-justified font-largest aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: are due to |W (d)∩V <sub>x</sub> | and <sub>E(|W</sub> <sup>|W</sup> (d)| (·)|) respectively. As
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=7 left-column full-justified font-largest aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: g(·) is based on the Okapi BM25 function (Robert-
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=7 left-column full-justified font-largest aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: son and Walker, 2000), which has been shown to be
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=8 left-column full-justified aligned-line year headchar-lower

column2: quite efficient in information retrieval, <sup>9</sup> we expected
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=8 left-column full-justified font-largest aligned-line headchar-lower above-double-space above-line-space

column2: <sup>7</sup> http://www.kotonoba.net/˜mutiyama/vocabridge/
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=8 left-column left-indent right-indent indented-line shorter-tail line-double-space line-space headchar-super

column2: <sup>8</sup> A type refers to a unique word, while a token refers to each
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=8 left-column left-indent aligned-line longer-tail headchar-super

column2: occurrence of a type.
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=8 left-column right-indent font-smallest hanged-line shorter-tail headchar-lower tailchar-period

column2: <sup>9</sup> BM25 and its variants have been proven to be quite effi-
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=8 left-column left-indent indented-line longer-tail headchar-super tailchar-hiphen

column2: cient in information retrieval. Readers are referred to papers by
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=9 left-column full-justified font-smallest hanged-line headchar-lower

column2: the Text REtrieval Conference (TREC, http://trec.nist.gov/), for
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=9 left-column full-justified font-smallest aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: example.
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=9 left-column right-indent font-smallest aligned-line shorter-tail headchar-lower tailchar-period above-blank-line above-double-space above-line-space
page=1 xpos=4 ypos=9 left-column left-indent right-indent indented-line longer-tail line-blank-line line-double-space line-space numeric-only column-bottom

column2: g(·) to be effective in retrieving documents relevant
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=0 right-column full-justified font-largest column-top headchar-lower

column2: to the target vocabulary.
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=0 right-column right-indent aligned-line shorter-tail headchar-lower tailchar-period

column2: In Eq. (1), α is used to combine the scores of
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=0 right-column left-indent font-largest indented-line longer-tail headchar-capital

column2: document d, which are obtained by using V todo and
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=0 right-column full-justified font-largest hanged-line headchar-lower

column2: V done . It is defined as
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=0 right-column right-indent font-largest aligned-line shorter-tail headchar-capital above-double-space above-line-space
page=1 xpos=7 ypos=1 right-column left-indent right-indent font-smaller indented-line longer-tail line-double-space line-space

column2: α = done (3)
column3: page=1 xpos=6 ypos=1 right-column left-indent font-largest hanged-line longer-tail

column2: 1 + |V done |
column3: page=1 xpos=7 ypos=1 right-column left-indent right-indent font-largest indented-line shorter-tail numbered-heading1 above-double-space above-line-space

column2: This implies that even if |W (d) ∩ V todo | is 1, it is
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=1 right-column full-justified font-largest hanged-line longer-tail line-double-space line-space headchar-capital

column2: as important as |W (d) ∩ V done | = |V done |. Con-
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=1 right-column full-justified font-largest aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: sequently, G(·) uses documents that have new types
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=1 right-column full-justified font-largest aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: of the given vocabulary in preference to documents
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=2 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: that have covered types.
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=2 right-column right-indent aligned-line shorter-tail headchar-lower tailchar-period

column2: To summarize, efficient courseware is constructed
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=2 right-column left-indent indented-line longer-tail headchar-capital

column2: by putting document d with maximum G(·) into C
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=2 right-column centered right-indent font-largest hanged-line headchar-lower

column2: until C covers all of V . This allows us to construct
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=2 right-column full-justified font-largest aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: efficient courseware because G(·) takes a large value
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=3 right-column full-justified font-largest aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: when a document has a large number of new types
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=3 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: and is short.
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=3 right-column right-indent aligned-line shorter-tail headchar-lower tailchar-period above-double-space above-line-space

column2: 3 Experiment
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=3 right-column right-indent font-larger aligned-line longer-tail line-double-space line-space numbered-heading1 above-double-space above-line-space

column2: This section describes how the courseware was con-
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=4 right-column full-justified aligned-line longer-tail line-double-space line-space headchar-capital tailchar-hiphen

column2: structed by applying the method described in the
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=4 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: previous section. We will first describe the vocab-
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=4 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: ulary and corpus used to construct the courseware
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=4 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: and then present the statistics for the courseware.
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=5 right-column right-indent aligned-line shorter-tail headchar-lower tailchar-period above-double-space above-line-space

column2: 3.1 Vocabulary
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=5 right-column right-indent aligned-line shorter-tail line-double-space line-space numbered-heading2 above-double-space above-line-space

column2: We used the specialized vocabulary used in the
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=5 right-column full-justified aligned-line longer-tail line-double-space line-space headchar-capital

column2: Test of English for International Communication
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=5 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-capital

column2: (TOEIC) because it is one of the most popular En-
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=6 right-column full-justified aligned-line tailchar-hiphen

column2: glish certification tests in Japan. The vocabulary was
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=6 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: compiled by Chujo (2003) and Chujo et al. (2004),
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=6 right-column full-justified aligned-line year headchar-lower tailchar-comma

column2: who confirmed that the vocabulary was useful in
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=6 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: preparing for the TOEIC test. The vocabulary had
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=6 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: 640 entries and we used 638 words from it that oc-
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=7 right-column full-justified aligned-line tailchar-hiphen

column2: curred at least once in the corpus as the target vocab-
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=7 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: ulary.
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=7 right-column right-indent aligned-line shorter-tail headchar-lower tailchar-period above-double-space above-line-space

column2: 3.2 Corpus
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=7 right-column right-indent aligned-line longer-tail line-double-space line-space numbered-heading2 above-double-space above-line-space

column2: We used articles from English Wikipedia as the tar-
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=8 right-column full-justified aligned-line longer-tail line-double-space line-space headchar-capital tailchar-hiphen

column2: get corpus, which is a free-content encyclopedia that
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=8 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: anyone can edit. The version we used in this study
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=8 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: had 478,611 articles. From these, we first discarded
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=8 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: stub and other non-normal articles. We also dis-
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=8 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: carded short articles of less than 150 words. We then
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=9 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: selected 60,498 articles that were referred to (linked)
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=9 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: by more than 15 articles. This 15-link threshold was
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=9 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower page-bottom

column2: set empirically to screen out noisy articles. Finally,
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=0 left-column full-justified page-top headchar-lower tailchar-comma

column2: we extracted a 150-word excerpt from the lead part
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=0 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: of each of these 60,498 articles to prepare the target
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=0 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: corpus. We set 150-word limit on an empirical basis
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=0 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: to reduce the burden imposed on learners. In short,
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=0 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-comma

column2: the target corpus consisted of 60,498 excerpts from
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=0 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: the English Wikipedia. In the rest of the paper, we
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=1 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: will use the term an article to refer to an excerpt that
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=1 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: was extracted according to this procedure.
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=1 left-column right-indent aligned-line shorter-tail headchar-lower tailchar-period above-double-space above-line-space

column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=1 left-column right-indent aligned-line shorter-tail line-double-space line-space numbered-heading2 above-double-space above-line-space

column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=2 left-column full-justified aligned-line longer-tail line-double-space line-space string-figure headchar-capital tailchar-hiphen

column2: ware. It was the first article obtained with the al-
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=2 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: gorithm. It shares 27 types and 49 tokens with the
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=2 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: target vocabulary. These words are printed in bold.
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=2 left-column right-indent aligned-line shorter-tail headchar-lower tailchar-period above-double-space above-line-space

column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=7 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=8 left-column full-justified font-largest aligned-line

column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=8 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower above-double-space above-line-space

column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=8 left-column left-indent indented-line line-double-space line-space headchar-super

column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=8 left-column full-justified font-smallest hanged-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=8 left-column full-justified font-smallest aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=9 left-column full-justified font-smallest aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: sented in this paper were calculated from the first courseware,
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=9 left-column full-justified font-smallest aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-comma

column2: course-1.
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=9 left-column right-indent font-smallest aligned-line shorter-tail headchar-lower tailchar-period above-blank-line above-double-space above-line-space
page=2 xpos=4 ypos=9 left-column left-indent right-indent indented-line longer-tail line-blank-line line-double-space line-space numeric-only column-bottom

column2: courseware was referred to by 70.7 articles on av-
column3: page=2 xpos=5 ypos=0 right-column full-justified column-top headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: erage as can be seen from the bottom row. Table
column3: page=2 xpos=5 ypos=0 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column3: page=2 xpos=5 ypos=0 right-column full-justified aligned-line numbered-heading1

column3: page=2 xpos=5 ypos=0 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: 3.4.2 Distribution of covered types
column3: page=2 xpos=5 ypos=1 right-column right-indent aligned-line longer-tail line-double-space line-space numbered-heading3 above-line-space

column2: Figure 2 plots the increase in the number of cov-
column3: page=2 xpos=5 ypos=1 right-column left-indent indented-line longer-tail line-space string-figure headchar-capital tailchar-hiphen

column2: ered types against the order (ranking) of articles that
column3: page=2 xpos=5 ypos=1 right-column full-justified hanged-line headchar-lower

column2: were put into the courseware. The horizontal axis
column3: page=2 xpos=5 ypos=1 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: represents the ranking of articles. The vertical axis
column3: page=2 xpos=5 ypos=1 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: indicates the number of covered types. The increase
column3: page=2 xpos=5 ypos=2 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: was sharpest when the ranking value was lowest (left
column3: page=2 xpos=5 ypos=2 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: of figure). The dotted horizontal lines indicate 50%
column3: page=2 xpos=5 ypos=2 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: and 90% of the target vocabulary. These lines cross
column3: page=2 xpos=5 ypos=2 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: the curved solid line at the 22nd and 83rd articles,
column3: page=2 xpos=5 ypos=2 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-comma

column2: i.e., 16.8% and 63.4% of the courseware, respec-
column3: page=2 xpos=5 ypos=3 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: tively. This means that learners can learn most of the
column3: page=2 xpos=5 ypos=3 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: target vocabulary from the beginning of the course-
column3: page=2 xpos=5 ypos=3 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: ware. This is desirable because learners sometimes
column3: page=2 xpos=5 ypos=3 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: do not have enough time to read all the courseware.
column3: page=2 xpos=5 ypos=3 right-column right-indent aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-period above-double-space above-line-space

column2: 4 Conclusion
column3: page=3 xpos=0 ypos=7 left-column right-indent font-larger hanged-line shorter-tail line-blank-line line-double-space line-space numbered-heading1 above-double-space above-line-space

column2: While many teachers agree that vocabulary learn-
column3: page=3 xpos=0 ypos=8 left-column full-justified aligned-line longer-tail line-double-space line-space headchar-capital tailchar-hiphen

column2: ing can be fostered by presenting words in context
column3: page=3 xpos=0 ypos=8 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: rather than isolating them from this, it is very dif-
column3: page=3 xpos=0 ypos=8 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: ficult to prepare reading materials that contain the
column3: page=3 xpos=0 ypos=8 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: specialized vocabulary to be learned. We have pro-
column3: page=3 xpos=0 ypos=8 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: posed a method of automating this preparation pro-
column3: page=3 xpos=0 ypos=9 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: cess (Utiyama et al., 2004). We have found that our
column3: page=3 xpos=0 ypos=9 left-column full-justified aligned-line year headchar-lower above-blank-line above-double-space above-line-space
page=3 xpos=4 ypos=9 left-column left-indent right-indent indented-line line-blank-line line-double-space line-space numeric-only column-bottom

column2: reading materials prepared from The Daily Yomiuri
column3: page=3 xpos=5 ypos=1 right-column full-justified column-top headchar-lower

column2: were effective in vocabulary learning (Tanimura and
column3: page=3 xpos=5 ypos=1 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: Utiyama, in preparation).
column3: page=3 xpos=5 ypos=1 right-column right-indent aligned-line shorter-tail headchar-capital tailchar-period

column2: Our next goal is to distribute courseware (pro-
column3: page=3 xpos=5 ypos=1 right-column left-indent indented-line longer-tail headchar-capital tailchar-hiphen

column2: duced with our algorithm) to EFL teachers and
column3: page=3 xpos=5 ypos=2 right-column full-justified hanged-line headchar-lower

column2: learners so that we can receive wider feedback. To
column3: page=3 xpos=5 ypos=2 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: this end, we replaced The Daily Yomiuri, which
column3: page=3 xpos=5 ypos=2 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: is copyrighted, with the English Wikipedia, which
column3: page=3 xpos=5 ypos=2 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: is a free-content encyclopedia, and developed new
column3: page=3 xpos=5 ypos=2 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: courseware whose statistics were presented and dis-
column3: page=3 xpos=5 ypos=3 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: cussed in this paper. This courseware, which is
column3: page=3 xpos=5 ypos=3 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: available on our web site, can be used to supplement
column3: page=3 xpos=5 ypos=3 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: classroom learning activities as well as self-study.
column3: page=3 xpos=5 ypos=3 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-period

column2: We hope it will help EFL learners to learn and teach-
column3: page=3 xpos=5 ypos=3 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-capital tailchar-hiphen

column2: ers to teach a broader range of vocabulary.
column3: page=3 xpos=5 ypos=4 right-column right-indent aligned-line shorter-tail headchar-lower tailchar-period above-blank-line above-double-space above-line-space
